name: IMPACT Executive Education
description: IMPACT Executive Education tears away from the traditional educational approaches currently on offer in the marketplace and goes straight to the heart of what is needed by Indonesia's State Owned Enterprises
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Prepare for all things
ShortDescription: IMPACT Executive Education is specifically aligned with Kementerian BUMN requirements.

Highlights.name: The BUMN Series Certificate
Highlights.description: Completion Certificates are awarded to learners who complete a course. Knowledge Certificates assess the knowledge and higher-order thinking of a learner around the key concepts of a course and are awarded to those learners who successfully design a project.

Highlights.name: The Effective Behaviour Series
Highlights.description: With 3 key elements: Personal Effectiveness, Interpersonal Effectiveness, & Effective Leadership IMPACT’s Effective Behaviour Series develops professionals that will come away with the ability to execute critical priorities with laser-like focus, plan carefully, and to collaborate more effectively by building high-trust relationships

enhanced_description: IMPACT Executive Education offers a non-traditional educational approach tailored specifically for Indonesia's State Owned Enterprises (SOEs) and their Board of Directors (BOD) and BOD-1 leaders. The program is precisely aligned with Kementerian BUMN requirements and aims to develop professionals capable of executing critical priorities, careful planning, and effective collaboration through building high-trust relationships. It includes 'The BUMN Series Certificate' for completion and knowledge assessment, and 'The Effective Behaviour Series' focusing on Personal, Interpersonal, and Effective Leadership.
key_use_cases: Leadership development for senior executives (BOD & BOD-1 leaders)
Fulfilling Kementerian BUMN requirements for executive training
Improving executive effectiveness in personal, interpersonal, and leadership domains
Enhancing strategic execution and critical priority management
Developing planning and collaboration skills among leaders
Assessing and certifying executive knowledge and higher-order thinking
competitive_advantages: Specifically aligned with Kementerian BUMN requirements
Tailored for Indonesia's State Owned Enterprises
Non-traditional educational approach designed for executive needs
roi_benefits: Improved executive effectiveness and leadership capabilities
Enhanced ability to execute critical priorities with focus
Better planning and more effective collaboration among leaders
Contribution to developing internal top talent for leadership roles
Meeting specific government (Kementerian BUMN) development mandates
